channel.title: How do i fix the client.class problem
channel.description: I recently download paradise x with the webclient files so i did everything uploaded to my host i use on hostgator but then everytime i run my webclient i get [code]this error java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] can anyone tell me how to fix please?

item.title: How do i fix the client.class problem
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.source: How do i fix the client.class problem

item.title: How do i fix the client.class problem

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Re jar the client again.

item.title: How do i fix the client.class problem

item.description:
@it0ken1 wrote:

It can’t find the client class.
You didn’t create the webclient right.
